track.name: Hard Time Killing Floor Blues
comments: This guy knows his blues - just awesome! By the way, nice bike there @DonkeyHotai
Now this is the blues! Awesome vocals, awesome guitar - it's the whole package. In my library for sure!
incredible voice..superb performance, wish it hung on longer
very touching....somthing in the soul.... like the music reached a spiritual tune accidently...and it makes me want to cry, but its geting a 5 star on my pod hah
This song just has something that is untouchable.  Definitely something that you just got to feel.
Watchin' a documentary on Robert Johnson on Ovation TV recently.  Pretty interesting.
Being a blues standard (it had been covered cagillion times), this is the only version I’ve heard so far. And boy, it is good.
